text:
Marino Quaresimin (22 November 1937 – 20 March 2020) was an Italian politician. He was born in Venice, Italy. Quaresimin was Mayor of Vicenza from 1995 to 1998.
Career.
During his political career, he was a member of the Italian People's Party, but later switched to Democracy is Freedom party. From 1999 to 2008, he was a member of the Vicenza city council.
During the 2020 coronavirus pandemic, Quaresimin died of COVID-19 on 20 March 2020 in Vicenza, aged 82.
